fields.summary: [VZ_CHR2FB][Webui] IPv6 address for equipments is not displayed in WebUI :: PRPLC-11796

fields.Action: Boot the DUT and Check the IPv6 Wan traces.
fields.Expected Result:
A DHCPv6 Cycle is triggered after boot and DUT obtains an IPv6 prefix.

	DUT LAN  interface is presents a IPv6 address. (ifconfig bridge)
	Eg,  inet6 addr: 2001:470:cb76:2000::100/64

fields.Action: From a 2.4GHz WLAN STA with Pure IPv6 connectivity(No IPv4 enabled on it). Associate it to the 2.4GHz Private SSID and check it's connectivity.
fields.Expected Result:
The 2.4GHz WLAN STA obtains an IPv6 IP address and its possible to surf the internet using IPv6 (e.g. ipv6.google.com)

	DNS resolutions and packets uses IPv6 addresses.

fields.Action: From a 5GHz WLAN STA with Pure IPv6 connectivity(No IPv4 enabled on it). Associate it to the 5GHz Private SSID and check it's connectivity.
fields.Expected Result:
The 5GHz WLAN STA obtains an IPv6 IP address and its possible to surf the internet using IPv6 (e.g. ipv6.google.com)

	DNS resolutions and packets uses IPv6 addresses.

fields.description:
The test aims to check the DUTR ability to offer IPv6 Wan connectivity to Private WLAN.(wireless)

[Precondition]

	Wan is UP with IPv6 on Wan Available. 
	Wifi Enabled
fields.summary: [IPv6] IPv6 Sanity Test - WLAN

security.description: Only SoftAtHome people can access the issue
security.name: SAH
